Patients initially enter 4 week screen phase confirm randomization meet DSM-IV criterion bipolar I II disorder , currently depress Hamilton Depression Rating Scale-17 item ( HAM-D ) total score ≥17 . After phase I , patient meet stable remission , define HAM-D total score ≤7 Young Mania Rating Scale ( YMRS ) total score ≤10 two consecutive visit least 4 week , qualify phase II III .
